comments.comment:
Supiri bro karapu wade.naha samahara aya thaman gane lajja wenne one.aththatama matath duka hithuna video eka balala ape minissu mechara pirihilada kiyanne.ada thakshana lokayath ekka minissunta godak dewal amathaka wela athe me minissu kauru hari wewa thamange jathika kodiya amathaka kara kiyanne thamange amma thaththa amathaka kara Ha samanai a mata danene vidiyata.
ada ape Sinhala vidiyata kidenagen kidenatada Ammata thaththata wadina gathawa jathika giya kiyanne puluwan ewagema eka theruma kiyanne puluwan unata kidenatada puluwan eke theruma kiyanne.bro Onne okwage video ekak karanne kiyaka Aradana karanewa theruma ahanne.
Bro oyata thibbe eka wayasa ewagema goda tharuna viye inne ayagen ahanne nemai ada kale pasal yane mallila nangilagen ahanne puluwan pasal nila aduma ho nathinam clz yane aya inne oya nugegoda awata a ayagen ahala balanne.apeta Aththatama hithata mara wedanawak a weddi danei ape ada Koheda inne kiyala..
Kauru hari kiyanewanam me lankawa diunu wemin pawathinawa kiyala mam kiyanne lasthi eka ehama naha ape diunu ratak.mokada ada ape godak ayata salli nathuwada lankawe thakshanaya nadda naha thiyanewa neda ape 2g sim pavichchi karapu ape ada weddi 5g sim pavichchi karanne lasti wela innewa itin thakshanaya nadda ada wahane lankawe hadanewa.aththatama ape diunu naththe manasin a kiyanne adyathmikawa ape diunu wela naha ape sankalpa pirihila tiyanne ekai ape thawamath diunu wemin pawathinawa kiyanne.udaharanayak japan Ewage rataka ganu lamayekta ra 12ta unath pare thaniyama yanne puluwan Athe lankawe puluwna anne ekai wenasa..
Suba gaman bro Ubata.hodata karagene yanne thawa issarahata gamanak yanne puluwan.
Budusaranai! suwathsthi siddam! rawana pihitai! devi pihitai!
